alert.note: Alert for Glacier; Pondera (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 22 at 6:47PM MDT until August 22 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM MDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL PONDERA AND SOUTHEASTERN GLACIER COUNTIES... At 646 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles east of Heart Butte, or 25 miles southwest of Cut Bank, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts, quarter size hail, and periods of heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Pondera and southeastern Glacier Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
